verses.text: \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w made|strong="H5648"\w* an \w image|strong="H6755"\w* of \w gold|strong="H1722"\w*, whose \w height|strong="H7314"\w* \add was\add* \w threescore|strong="H8361"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0521"\w*, \add and\add* the \w breadth|strong="H6613"\w* thereof \w six|strong="H8353"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0521"\w*: he set it \w up|strong="H6966"\w* in the \w plain|strong="H1236"\w* of \w Dura|strong="H1757"\w*, in the \w province|strong="H4083"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*.

Then \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w sent|strong="H7972"\w* to gather \w together|strong="H3673"\w* the \w princes|strong="H0324"\w*, the \w governors|strong="H5460"\w*, and the \w captains|strong="H6347"\w*, the \w judges|strong="H0148"\w*, the \w treasurers|strong="H1411"\w*, the \w counsellors|strong="H1884"\w*, the \w sheriffs|strong="H8614"\w*, and \w all|strong="H3606"\w* the \w rulers|strong="H7984"\w* of the \w provinces|strong="H4083"\w*, to \w come|strong="H0858"\w* to the \w dedication|strong="H2597"\w* of the \w image|strong="H6755"\w* which \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* had set \w up|strong="H6966"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* the \w princes|strong="H0324"\w*, the \w governors|strong="H5460"\w*, and \w captains|strong="H6347"\w*, the \w judges|strong="H0148"\w*, the \w treasurers|strong="H1411"\w*, the \w counsellors|strong="H1884"\w*, the \w sheriffs|strong="H8614"\w*, and \w all|strong="H3606"\w* the \w rulers|strong="H7984"\w* of the \w provinces|strong="H4083"\w*, were gathered \w together|strong="H3673"\w* unto the \w dedication|strong="H2597"\w* of the \w image|strong="H6755"\w* that \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* had set \w up|strong="H6966"\w*; and they \w stood|strong="H6966"\w* \w before|strong="H6903"\w* the \w image|strong="H6755"\w* that \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* had set \w up|strong="H6966"\w*.

Then an \w herald|strong="H3744"\w* \w cried|strong="H7123"\w* \w aloud|strong="H2429"\w*, To you it is \w commanded|strong="H0560"\w*, O \w people|strong="H5972"\w*, \w nations|strong="H0524"\w*, and \w languages|strong="H3961"\w*,\f + \fr 3.4 \ft aloud: Chaldee, with might\f*\f + \fr 3.4 \ft it…: Chaldee, they command\f*

\add That\add* at what \w time|strong="H5732"\w* ye \w hear|strong="H8086"\w* the \w sound|strong="H7032"\w* of the \w cornet|strong="H7162"\w*, \w flute|strong="H4953"\w*, \w harp|strong="H7030"\w*, \w sackbut|strong="H5443"\w*, \w psaltery|strong="H6460"\w*, \w dulcimer|strong="H5481"\w*, and \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w kinds|strong="H2178"\w* of \w musick|strong="H2170"\w*, ye fall \w down|strong="H5308"\w* and \w worship|strong="H5457"\w* the \w golden|strong="H1722"\w* \w image|strong="H6755"\w* that \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* hath set \w up|strong="H6966"\w*:\f + \fr 3.5 \ft dulcimer: or, singing: Chaldee, symphony\f*

And \w whoso|strong="H4479"\w* \w falleth|strong="H5308"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w down|strong="H5308"\w* and \w worshippeth|strong="H5457"\w* shall the same \w hour|strong="H8160"\w* be \w cast|strong="H7412"\w* into the \w midst|strong="H1459"\w* of a \w burning|strong="H3345"\w* \w fiery|strong="H5135"\w* \w furnace|strong="H0861"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H6903"\w* at that \w time|strong="H2166"\w*, \w when|strong="H1768"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* the \w people|strong="H5972"\w* \w heard|strong="H8086"\w* the \w sound|strong="H7032"\w* of the \w cornet|strong="H7162"\w*, \w flute|strong="H4953"\w*, \w harp|strong="H7030"\w*, \w sackbut|strong="H5443"\w*, \w psaltery|strong="H6460"\w*, and \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w kinds|strong="H2178"\w* of \w musick|strong="H2170"\w*, \w all|strong="H3606"\w* the \w people|strong="H5972"\w*, the \w nations|strong="H0524"\w*, and the \w languages|strong="H3961"\w*, fell \w down|strong="H5308"\w* \add and\add* \w worshipped|strong="H5457"\w* the \w golden|strong="H1722"\w* \w image|strong="H6755"\w* that \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* had set \w up|strong="H6966"\w*.

¶ \w Wherefore|strong="H6903"\w* at \w that|strong="H1836"\w* \w time|strong="H2166"\w* \w certain|strong="H1400"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3779"\w* came \w near|strong="H7127"\w*, and \w accused|strong="H7170"\w* the \w Jews|strong="H3062"\w*.

They \w spake|strong="H6032"\w* and \w said|strong="H0560"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w*, O \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w live|strong="H2418"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5957"\w*.

\w Thou|strong="H0607"\w*, O \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, hast \w made|strong="H7761"\w* a \w decree|strong="H2942"\w*, that \w every|strong="H3606"\w* \w man|strong="H0606"\w* that shall \w hear|strong="H8086"\w* the \w sound|strong="H7032"\w* of the \w cornet|strong="H7162"\w*, \w flute|strong="H4953"\w*, \w harp|strong="H7030"\w*, \w sackbut|strong="H5443"\w*, \w psaltery|strong="H6460"\w*, and \w dulcimer|strong="H5481"\w*, and \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w kinds|strong="H2178"\w* of \w musick|strong="H2170"\w*, shall fall \w down|strong="H5308"\w* and \w worship|strong="H5457"\w* the \w golden|strong="H1722"\w* \w image|strong="H6755"\w*:\f + \fr 3.10 \ft dulcimer: or, singing: Chaldee, symphony\f*

And \w whoso|strong="H4479"\w* \w falleth|strong="H5308"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w down|strong="H5308"\w* and \w worshippeth|strong="H5457"\w*, \add that\add* he should be \w cast|strong="H7412"\w* into the \w midst|strong="H1459"\w* of a \w burning|strong="H3345"\w* \w fiery|strong="H5135"\w* \w furnace|strong="H0861"\w*.

There \w are|strong="H0383"\w* \w certain|strong="H1400"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3062"\w* \w whom|strong="H3487"\w* thou hast \w set|strong="H4483"\w* \w over|strong="H5922"\w* the \w affairs|strong="H5673"\w* of the \w province|strong="H4083"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*, \w Shadrach|strong="H7715"\w*, \w Meshach|strong="H4336"\w*, and \w Abed-nego|strong="H5665"\w*; \w these|strong="H0479"\w* \w men|strong="H1400"\w*, O \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w have|strong="H7761"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w regarded|strong="H2942"\w* \w thee|strong="H5922"\w*: they \w serve|strong="H6399"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* thy \w gods|strong="H0426"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3809"\w* \w worship|strong="H5457"\w* the \w golden|strong="H1722"\w* \w image|strong="H6755"\w* which thou hast set \w up|strong="H6966"\w*.\f + \fr 3.12 \ft have…: Chaldee, have set no regard upon thee\f*

¶ \w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* in \add his\add* \w rage|strong="H7266"\w* and \w fury|strong="H2528"\w* \w commanded|strong="H0560"\w* to \w bring|strong="H0858"\w* \w Shadrach|strong="H7715"\w*, \w Meshach|strong="H4336"\w*, and \w Abed-nego|strong="H5665"\w*. \w Then|strong="H0116"\w* they \w brought|strong="H0858"\w* \w these|strong="H0479"\w* \w men|strong="H1400"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w*.

\w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w spake|strong="H6032"\w* and \w said|strong="H0560"\w* unto them, \add Is it\add* \w true|strong="H6656"\w*, O \w Shadrach|strong="H7715"\w*, \w Meshach|strong="H4336"\w*, and \w Abed-nego|strong="H5665"\w*, do \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w ye|strong="H0383"\w* \w serve|strong="H6399"\w* my \w gods|strong="H0426"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3809"\w* \w worship|strong="H5457"\w* the \w golden|strong="H1722"\w* \w image|strong="H6755"\w* which I have \w set|strong="H6966"\w* up?\f + \fr 3.14 \ft true: or, of purpose\f*

\w Now|strong="H3705"\w* \w if|strong="H2006"\w* ye \w be|strong="H0383"\w* \w ready|strong="H6263"\w* that at what \w time|strong="H5732"\w* ye \w hear|strong="H8086"\w* the \w sound|strong="H7032"\w* of the \w cornet|strong="H7162"\w*, \w flute|strong="H4953"\w*, \w harp|strong="H7030"\w*, \w sackbut|strong="H5443"\w*, \w psaltery|strong="H6460"\w*, and \w dulcimer|strong="H5481"\w*, and \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w kinds|strong="H2178"\w* of \w musick|strong="H2170"\w*, ye fall \w down|strong="H5308"\w* and \w worship|strong="H5457"\w* the \w image|strong="H6755"\w* which I have \w made|strong="H5648"\w*; \add well:\add* but \w if|strong="H2006"\w* ye \w worship|strong="H5457"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w*, ye shall be \w cast|strong="H7412"\w* the same \w hour|strong="H8160"\w* into the \w midst|strong="H1459"\w* of a \w burning|strong="H3345"\w* \w fiery|strong="H5135"\w* \w furnace|strong="H0861"\w*; and \w who|strong="H4479"\w* \add is\add* that \w God|strong="H0426"\w* that shall \w deliver|strong="H7804"\w* you out \w of|strong="H4481"\w* my \w hands|strong="H3028"\w*?\f + \fr 3.15 \ft dulcimer: or, singing: Chaldee, symphony\f*

\w Shadrach|strong="H7715"\w*, \w Meshach|strong="H4336"\w*, and \w Abed-nego|strong="H5665"\w*, \w answered|strong="H6032"\w* and \w said|strong="H0560"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, O \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w*, \w we|strong="H0586"\w* \add are\add* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w careful|strong="H2818"\w* to \w answer|strong="H8421"\w* thee \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w matter|strong="H6600"\w*.

\w If|strong="H2006"\w* it be \add so\add*, our \w God|strong="H0426"\w* whom \w we|strong="H0586"\w* \w serve|strong="H6399"\w* \w is|strong="H0383"\w* \w able|strong="H3202"\w* to \w deliver|strong="H7804"\w* us \w from|strong="H4481"\w* the \w burning|strong="H3345"\w* \w fiery|strong="H5135"\w* \w furnace|strong="H0861"\w*, \w and|strong="H4481"\w* he will \w deliver|strong="H7804"\w* \add us\add* out \w of|strong="H4481"\w* thine \w hand|strong="H3028"\w*, O \w king|strong="H4430"\w*.

But \w if|strong="H2006"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w*, be \w it|strong="H1934"\w* \w known|strong="H3046"\w* unto thee, O \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, that we \w will|strong="H0383"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w serve|strong="H6399"\w* thy \w gods|strong="H0426"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3809"\w* \w worship|strong="H5457"\w* the \w golden|strong="H1722"\w* \w image|strong="H6755"\w* which thou hast set \w up|strong="H6966"\w*.

¶ \w Then|strong="H0116"\w* was \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w full|strong="H4391"\w* of \w fury|strong="H2528"\w*, and the \w form|strong="H6755"\w* of his \w visage|strong="H0600"\w* was \w changed|strong="H8133"\w* \w against|strong="H5922"\w* \w Shadrach|strong="H7715"\w*, \w Meshach|strong="H4336"\w*, and \w Abed-nego|strong="H5665"\w*: \add therefore\add* he \w spake|strong="H6032"\w*, and \w commanded|strong="H0560"\w* that they should \w heat|strong="H0228"\w* the \w furnace|strong="H0861"\w* \w one|strong="H2298"\w* seven \w times|strong="H7655"\w* \w more|strong="H5922"\w* \w than|strong="H1768"\w* it was \w wont|strong="H2370"\w* to be \w heated|strong="H0228"\w*.\f + \fr 3.19 \ft full: Chaldee, filled\f*

And he \w commanded|strong="H0560"\w* the \w most|strong="H2429"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1401"\w* \w men|strong="H1400"\w* that \add were\add* in his \w army|strong="H2429"\w* to \w bind|strong="H3729"\w* \w Shadrach|strong="H7715"\w*, \w Meshach|strong="H4336"\w*, and \w Abed-nego|strong="H5665"\w*, \add and\add* to \w cast|strong="H7412"\w* \add them\add* into the \w burning|strong="H3345"\w* \w fiery|strong="H5135"\w* \w furnace|strong="H0861"\w*.\f + \fr 3.20 \ft most…: Chaldee, mighty of strength\f*

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w these|strong="H0479"\w* \w men|strong="H1400"\w* were \w bound|strong="H3729"\w* in their \w coats|strong="H5622"\w*, their \w hosen|strong="H6361"\w*, and their \w hats|strong="H3737"\w*, and their \add other\add* \w garments|strong="H3831"\w*, and were \w cast|strong="H7412"\w* into the \w midst|strong="H1459"\w* of the \w burning|strong="H3345"\w* \w fiery|strong="H5135"\w* \w furnace|strong="H0861"\w*.\f + \fr 3.21 \ft coats: or, mantles\f*\f + \fr 3.21 \ft hats: or, turbans\f*

\w Therefore|strong="H3606"\w* \w because|strong="H4481"\w* the \w king’s|strong="H4430"\w* \w commandment|strong="H4406"\w* was \w urgent|strong="H2685"\w*, and the \w furnace|strong="H0861"\w* \w exceeding|strong="H3493"\w* \w hot|strong="H0228"\w*, the \w flame|strong="H7631"\w* of the \w fire|strong="H5135"\w* \w slew|strong="H6992"\w* \w those|strong="H0479"\w* \w men|strong="H1400"\w* that took \w up|strong="H5267"\w* \w Shadrach|strong="H7715"\w*, \w Meshach|strong="H4336"\w*, and \w Abed-nego|strong="H5665"\w*.\f + \fr 3.22 \ft commandment: Chaldee, word\f*\f + \fr 3.22 \ft flame: or, spark\f*

And \w these|strong="H0479"\w* \w three|strong="H8532"\w* \w men|strong="H1400"\w*, \w Shadrach|strong="H7715"\w*, \w Meshach|strong="H4336"\w*, and \w Abed-nego|strong="H5665"\w*, fell \w down|strong="H5308"\w* \w bound|strong="H3729"\w* into the \w midst|strong="H1459"\w* of the \w burning|strong="H3345"\w* \w fiery|strong="H5135"\w* \w furnace|strong="H0861"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* was \w astonied|strong="H8429"\w*, and rose \w up|strong="H6966"\w* in \w haste|strong="H0927"\w*, \add and\add* \w spake|strong="H6032"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0560"\w* unto his \w counsellors|strong="H1907"\w*, Did \w not|strong="H3809"\w* we \w cast|strong="H7412"\w* \w three|strong="H8532"\w* \w men|strong="H1400"\w* \w bound|strong="H3729"\w* into the \w midst|strong="H1459"\w* of the \w fire|strong="H5135"\w*? They \w answered|strong="H6032"\w* and \w said|strong="H0560"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w True|strong="H3330"\w*, O \w king|strong="H4430"\w*.\f + \fr 3.24 \ft counsellors: or, governors\f*

He \w answered|strong="H6032"\w* and \w said|strong="H0560"\w*, \w Lo|strong="H1888"\w*, \w I|strong="H0576"\w* \w see|strong="H2370"\w* \w four|strong="H0703"\w* \w men|strong="H1400"\w* \w loose|strong="H8271"\w*, \w walking|strong="H1981"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H1459"\w* of the \w fire|strong="H5135"\w*, and they \w have|strong="H0383"\w* \w no|strong="H3809"\w* \w hurt|strong="H2257"\w*; and the \w form|strong="H7299"\w* of the \w fourth|strong="H7244"\w* is \w like|strong="H1821"\w* the \w Son|strong="H1247"\w* of \w God|strong="H0426"\w*.\f + \fr 3.25 \ft they…: Chaldee, there is no hurt in them\f*

¶ \w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* came \w near|strong="H7127"\w* to the \w mouth|strong="H8651"\w* of the \w burning|strong="H3345"\w* \w fiery|strong="H5135"\w* \w furnace|strong="H0861"\w*, \add and\add* \w spake|strong="H6032"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0560"\w*, \w Shadrach|strong="H7715"\w*, \w Meshach|strong="H4336"\w*, and \w Abed-nego|strong="H5665"\w*, ye \w servants|strong="H5649"\w* of the most \w high|strong="H5943"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w*, come \w forth|strong="H5312"\w*, and \w come|strong="H0858"\w* \add hither\add*. \w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w Shadrach|strong="H7715"\w*, \w Meshach|strong="H4336"\w*, and \w Abed-nego|strong="H5665"\w*, came \w forth|strong="H5312"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* the \w midst|strong="H1459"\w* of the \w fire|strong="H5135"\w*.\f + \fr 3.26 \ft mouth: Chaldee, door\f*

And the \w princes|strong="H0324"\w*, \w governors|strong="H5460"\w*, and \w captains|strong="H6347"\w*, and the \w king’s|strong="H4430"\w* \w counsellors|strong="H1907"\w*, being gathered \w together|strong="H3673"\w*, \w saw|strong="H2370"\w* \w these|strong="H0479"\w* \w men|strong="H1400"\w*, upon whose \w bodies|strong="H1655"\w* the \w fire|strong="H5135"\w* had \w no|strong="H3809"\w* \w power|strong="H7981"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3809"\w* was an \w hair|strong="H8177"\w* of their \w head|strong="H7217"\w* \w singed|strong="H2761"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3809"\w* were their \w coats|strong="H5622"\w* \w changed|strong="H8133"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3809"\w* the \w smell|strong="H7382"\w* of \w fire|strong="H5135"\w* had \w passed|strong="H5709"\w* on them.

\add Then\add* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w spake|strong="H6032"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0560"\w*, \w Blessed|strong="H1289"\w* \add be\add* the \w God|strong="H0426"\w* of \w Shadrach|strong="H7715"\w*, \w Meshach|strong="H4336"\w*, and \w Abed-nego|strong="H5665"\w*, who hath \w sent|strong="H7972"\w* his \w angel|strong="H4398"\w*, and \w delivered|strong="H7804"\w* his \w servants|strong="H5649"\w* that \w trusted|strong="H7365"\w* in \w him|strong="H5922"\w*, and have \w changed|strong="H8133"\w* the \w king’s|strong="H4430"\w* \w word|strong="H4406"\w*, and \w yielded|strong="H3052"\w* their \w bodies|strong="H1655"\w*, that they might \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w serve|strong="H6399"\w* \w nor|strong="H3809"\w* \w worship|strong="H5457"\w* \w any|strong="H3606"\w* \w god|strong="H0426"\w*, \w except|strong="H3861"\w* their own \w God|strong="H0426"\w*.

Therefore \w I|strong="H4481"\w* \w make|strong="H7761"\w* a \w decree|strong="H2942"\w*, That \w every|strong="H3606"\w* \w people|strong="H5972"\w*, \w nation|strong="H0524"\w*, and \w language|strong="H3961"\w*, which \w speak|strong="H0560"\w* any thing \w amiss|strong="H7960"\w* \w against|strong="H5922"\w* the \w God|strong="H0426"\w* of \w Shadrach|strong="H7715"\w*, \w Meshach|strong="H4336"\w*, and \w Abed-nego|strong="H5665"\w*, shall be \w cut|strong="H5648"\w* in \w pieces|strong="H1917"\w*, and their \w houses|strong="H1005"\w* shall be \w made|strong="H7739"\w* a \w dunghill|strong="H5122"\w*: \w because|strong="H6903"\w* there \w is|strong="H0383"\w* \w no|strong="H3809"\w* \w other|strong="H0321"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* that \w can|strong="H3202"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5338"\w* after \w this|strong="H1836"\w* sort.\f + \fr 3.29 \ft I make…: Chaldee, a decree is made by me\f*\f + \fr 3.29 \ft any…: Chaldee, error\f*\f + \fr 3.29 \ft cut…: Chaldee, made pieces\f*

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w promoted|strong="H6744"\w* \w Shadrach|strong="H7715"\w*, \w Meshach|strong="H4336"\w*, and \w Abed-nego|strong="H5665"\w*, in the \w province|strong="H4083"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*.\f + \fr 3.30 \ft promoted: Chaldee, made to prosper\f*
